info.title: WorldTime.io - Free
info.description: The free version of the World Time Engine API for small project needs. For the full developer and enterprise versions of this API check out the link provided above.

get.description: Provide the latitude and longitude coordinates for any point on earth and get the current local time in that location.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: The latitude of the location that you want to obtain the current local time for.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: The longitude of the location that you want to obtain the current local time for.

get.description: Provide any IP Address and this API will tell you the current time in that location.

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description: The IPv4 Address that you want to query for its current time zone rules.
